title: Appropriates $10 million to the division of housing and community renewal to assist municipalities in housing demolition
summary: Makes a one-time appropriation of $10 million to the division of housing and community renewal to assist municipalities in the demolition and removal of abandoned or dangerous housing; authorizes the distribution of grants in amounts not to exceed $750,000 for any one municipality in any one year.
actClause: AN ACT making an appropriation to the division of housing and community renewal for housing demolition assistance
